name: Life Jacket - Indigo
description: Description In winter we want to get on with things without leaving our duvets. This indigo life jacket is stuffed with pillow filling. name: Cigarette factory worksuit
description: Description A versatile one-piece suit that means we never have to change, whether we're working or playing. We wear it in the office or workshop and relax in it at home. It can be styled up or down. It's cut to fit a variety of body shapes. There are two gathered pockets on the front, two flush pockets on the back. Materials The suit is made of a soft and easy-to-maintain indigo-dyed cotton. The braces are a durable PVC. name: Rubber factory worksuit

name: Worker's suit

name: Blue-collar suit
